name: Patriot PCBOWAU2-N 802.11a/b/g/n USB Type-A Wi-Fi Adapter
Features: [Compatible with Patriot Box Office Media Player or any other desktop/laptop systems, 2x gain for double the performance, Qos, NDS and PSP X-link Support, 54Mbps data transfer rate and up to 300Mbps @64dBm, One touch WPS (Wi-Fi Protected Setup) for easy security setup, WED, TKZP, AES, WPA and WPA2 hardware encryption schemes, Higher throughput using MIMO]
